verses.text: Whosoever \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w yoke|strong="G2218"\w*, \w let|strong="G2443"\w* \w them|strong="G2233"\w* \w count|strong="G2233"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w masters|strong="G1203"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* honour; \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Lord|strong="G1203"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G3956"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w blasphemed|strong="G0987"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w believing|strong="G4103"\w* \w masters|strong="G1203"\w*, \w let|strong="G1510"\w* \w them|strong="G3870"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w despise|strong="G2706"\w* \w them|strong="G3870"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w serve|strong="G1398"\w* \w them|strong="G3870"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* partakers \w of|strong="G0080"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w benefit|strong="G2108"\w*. \w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w teach|strong="G1321"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w exhort|strong="G3870"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w teach|strong="G2085"\w* \w otherwise|strong="G1487"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* consent \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w sound|strong="G5198"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w that|strong="G5100"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G2962"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w*,

\w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G3739"\w* proud, \w knowing|strong="G1987"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* sick \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w questions|strong="G2214"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* strifes \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w words|strong="G3055"\w*; \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w arise|strong="G1096"\w* envies, contentions, \w blasphemies|strong="G0988"\w*, \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w suspicions|strong="G5283"\w*,

Conflicts \w of|strong="G0444"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w corrupted|strong="G1311"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w mind|strong="G3563"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* destitute \w of|strong="G0444"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w supposing|strong="G3543"\w* \w gain|strong="G4200"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w*.
\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w contentment|strong="G0841"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w gain|strong="G4200"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G3754"\w* \w brought|strong="G1533"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*: \w and|strong="G2889"\w* \w certainly|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G3754"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w carry|strong="G1627"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w out|strong="G1627"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w food|strong="G1305"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* wherewith \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w covered|strong="G2192"\w*, \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w we|strong="G3778"\w* \w are|strong="G3778"\w* \w content|strong="G0714"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1519"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3748"\w* \w will|strong="G0444"\w* \w become|strong="G4147"\w* \w rich|strong="G4147"\w*, \w fall|strong="G1706"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w temptation|strong="G3986"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w snare|strong="G3803"\w* \w of|strong="G0444"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* devil, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* unprofitable \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hurtful \w desires|strong="G1939"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* drown \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w destruction|strong="G0684"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w perdition|strong="G0684"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w desire|strong="G3713"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w money|strong="G5365"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w root|strong="G4491"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w evils|strong="G2556"\w*; \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* coveting \w have|strong="G1510"\w* erred \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* entangled \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* sorrows.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* thou, \w O|strong="G5599"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, fly \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w pursue|strong="G1377"\w* \w justice|strong="G1343"\w*, \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w*, \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, charity, \w patience|strong="G5281"\w*, mildness.

\w Fight|strong="G0073"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w fight|strong="G0073"\w* \w of|strong="G1799"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*: lay \w hold|strong="G1949"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, whereunto thou art \w called|strong="G2564"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hast \w confessed|strong="G3670"\w* \w a|strong="G3739"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w confession|strong="G3671"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w*.

\w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w charge|strong="G3853"\w* thee \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* quickeneth \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w gave|strong="G3853"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3140"\w* \w under|strong="G1909"\w* \w Pontius|strong="G4194"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w*, \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w confession|strong="G3671"\w*,

\w That|strong="G1785"\w* thou \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w* without spot, blameless, unto \w the|strong="G3588"\w* coming \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*,

\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G3739"\w* \w times|strong="G2540"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* shew \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w only|strong="G3441"\w* Mighty, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w King|strong="G0935"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w kings|strong="G0935"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w lords|strong="G2962"\w*;

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w only|strong="G3441"\w* hath \w immortality|strong="G0110"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* inhabiteth \w light|strong="G5457"\w* inaccessible, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* hath \w seen|strong="G3708"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w*: \w to|strong="G1410"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* honour \w and|strong="G2532"\w* empire everlasting. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.

\w Charge|strong="G3853"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w rich|strong="G4145"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w world|strong="G0165"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w be|strong="G3956"\w* highminded, \w nor|strong="G3366"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w trust|strong="G1679"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w uncertainty|strong="G0083"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w riches|strong="G4149"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* living \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, (\w who|strong="G3588"\w* giveth \w us|strong="G1519"\w* \w abundantly|strong="G4146"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w enjoy|strong="G0619"\w*,)

\w To|strong="G1722"\w* \w do|strong="G1510"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w*, \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w rich|strong="G4147"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, \w to|strong="G1722"\w* give easily, \w to|strong="G1722"\w* communicate \w to|strong="G1722"\w* others,

\w To|strong="G1519"\w* lay \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* store \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w a|strong="G1438"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w foundation|strong="G2310"\w* \w against|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* time \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w come|strong="G3195"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they \w may|strong="G2443"\w* lay \w hold|strong="G1949"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* true \w life|strong="G2222"\w*.

\w O|strong="G5599"\w* \w Timothy|strong="G5095"\w*, \w keep|strong="G5442"\w* that \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* committed \w to|strong="G2532"\w* thy trust, \w avoiding|strong="G1624"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w profane|strong="G0952"\w* novelties \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w words|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* oppositions \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w* \w falsely|strong="G5581"\w* \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w called|strong="G5581"\w*.

\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w promising|strong="G1861"\w*, \w have|strong="G5100"\w* erred \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*. \w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w be|strong="G3326"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* thee. Amen.
